explains: n. 暴风雪；大批侵扰性的事物，大量的负担
wordGroup: blizzard entertainment 暴雪娱乐公司

sentences.en: The blizzard was still raging outside.
He drew back the tent flap and strode out into the blizzard.
sentences.cn: 他拉开帐篷的门帘，大步走进了暴风雪中。

sentences.en: We play all kinds of games at Blizzard.
sentences.cn: 我们在暴雪尝试各种游戏。
